Scattershot:

Scattershot heard Ultra Optimus and looked back to DevilDuer, whispering.  
"He's going to take on Liono.  We should stay and see if anything happens 
with that."

Turning his attention to Ultra Optimus, he began to answer the questions.  "I 
am Scattershot.  No one high in the Alliance hierarchy.  Though I am...of 
course...the strongest.  The Alliance is a group of Predacons and other 
robots who have forged into a mighty faction of this war.  We have the least 
amount of troops, but we will win nonethless because of superior leadership 
and intelligence."
